description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/02/2005

Dante stands by Bridget through her ultrasound. Brooke refuses to give into her passion for Nick, but Nick reminds Brooke that she has his heart. Eric is my future, Brooke tells Nick. However, he doesn’t believe her as he pulls her into a steamy kiss. Stephanie plans her revenge on Eric.
